Trade/Device Name(s): Light DiagnosticsTM Human Metapneumovirus DFA Kit
Light DiagnosticsTM Human Metapneumovirus Direct Immunofluorescence Assay
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory Viral Panel Multiplex Nucleic Acid Assay
Specimen Type(s): Respiratory specimen cell preparations from nasopharyngeal swabs
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Light Diagnostics Human Metapneumovirus DFA Kit, a direct immunofluorescence assay for detection of human metapneumovirus from nasopharyngeal swabs
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection and identification of human metapneumovirus (hMPV) in direct respiratory specimen cell preparations from nasopharyngeal swab samples collected from patients with febrile respiratory illness.
